column5: 177 days & counting down to our 9th year of trips to Lac Seul Lake at Fisherman's Cove Resort. Can't beat fantastic walleye fishing with family & friends! RBF
Cedar Lake Lodge in Perrault Falls for the 31st time in 5 months and 12 days..

dave its jim wolf our group is going to wine river camp the last week of may and woman river camp the 3rd week of september at their outpost camp went last year and had a great time used the three way swivel rig you showed me a goose bay last year and it worked well our group found theses camps much more remote than goose bay lodge just to much boat traffic please keep in touch jim wolf
Jim, I know the traffic can get pretty bad, one of goals for this years trip is explore more of the NW section! Send me a PM and we'll see what happens for future trips!

Headed to Wine Lake Camp in 134 days. Trout will be flopping in the shallows and pike will be hungry. I just hope it is warm enough that the walleye are past the post spawn lull. "It don't get any better than that, how could it?"- Troy Landry
Jim, I know you are going to have a great time at WLC! GO IRISH!
So Dave--are you limiting replies on this thread to one a month, one a week, one a day, or by the hour?
179 days till LOTW - Wiley Point Lodge.... should be great fishing as usual. Couple of big birthdays to celebrate this year up there...
2 days....leaving on Friday for 5 days of backcountry lake trout, walleye and crappie chasing in the Nestor Falls area....
Sorry rev my New Years fishing resolutions didn't include a posting limit! I'm not on facebook so this is my post-Pre trip therapy!!

Happy New Year to all! 2013 has begun! So has the Official 2013 Countdown Thread! 165 days to go now before we hit Goose Bay Camp on Lac Seul! Before noon on the 31st I used the Bass Pro gift cards I received at Christmas for a new cooler, water-proofing spray and yes a few more jigs!!I hope you all have great trips this year!
144 to go, Frog Rapids Camp, Sioux Lookout.

145 days to go until we're up at camp for the Spring Opener.....2 day drive up from Eastern Ohio with my good buddies, though who's counting the miles (ha)....looking at the photos from our previous years helps get through these winter "blah" days....will be busting out my Christmas "Cabela's" gift cards one of these days and figuring out what new baits (and replacements) are needed for 2013 ! Faith, Family, Friends.......and Fishing, Rich B
231 days, 22 hours, 13 minutes and 40 seconds to go!!!!!! Birch Dale Lodge on Eagle Lake For our 25th year.
163 till Lake of the Woods
163 and a wakeup to Frog Rapids Camp for trip 1 192 and a wakeup to Frog Rapids Camp for trip 2 So many fish, so little time. I don't wanna EAT em, I just wanna MEET em!
159 for us Cedar Lake near Perrault Falls, staying at Keystone. Rich B. will look forward to your post about cedar. Can't wait!
157 till we visit Halley's Camps, Salvesen Lake outpost
165 to NW of Lac Seul. Gotta get my tiller arm in shape for the trips to McKenzie Bay.KT
Hey KT where are you staying in June? Ill be at Goose Bay. If your near by maybe we could have a cup of coffee or a beer!
